employers.summary:
For the past year, I have assisted in or led the development of over 15+ websites, utilizing the content management system KenticoCMS

On the back end, I developed modules, web pages, and controls using C#/.NET, and some minor Visual Basic.
On the front end, I utilized HTML5, CSS3, and Javascript, as well as numerous Javascript

Some recent clients include:

  • Hospice Foundation of America
  • Archetype USA
  • The Total Money Athlete

At Games That Move You, I aided in the development of a number of different therapy based video games. These games were developed for patients with Parkinson's Disease, Muscular Dystrophy, and those who have suffered a stroke.

I was tasked with designing and developing the user interface for the games, as well as some of the back end functionality.

The main game developed is called Recovery Rapids.
Development of the games was accomplished using Unity3d.
The functionality of the games was developed in C#.
